comment: This was one of the laziest professors I've ever had. Every time I asked her for help she never answered my questions. When I needed her the most at the end, She didn't even respond to me. If you take her, please make sure you already know how statistics and SPSS works. She won't help you at all.

She provides the information for each week, so the textbook wasn't really needed. The HW isn't hard once you get used to SPSS. Tests are somewhat hard but doesn't really involve much math. The first two tests were lockdown but the final wasn't. She takes forever to grade though so you won't really know how you're doing in the class until the end.

Professor Drohan was so understanding and a great professor there has been multiple times where I turned in late assignments even a month after and she still gave me full credit. I think once you get the hang of things and how to use SPSS the class isn't half bad. I would 100% take her again especially with how understanding she was.

Would rather take a hard professor who is thorough than take a class with her again. She is very unorganized, namely in terms of due dates and the links to things on the exams are broken. no she doesnt fix this if you tell her. Light workload relatively, but not present as a professor. Pick the harder prof, i wish i had.
You will have to teach yourself. I have an email from her that says "if you have any questions about the material, google it." I honestly can not believe she is allowed to "teach" this course.

Waited on grades for over a month, so had no idea how I was actually doing in class until the end of semester. Expect to teach yourself, use youtube, etc. Not a harsh grader & quiz's are open book. Assignments aren't too difficult. Would recommend if math is not your strong suite & you don't care about retaining the info

I don't have much bad to say, she's an easy grader and gives you all the information you need to pass the course. However, she does not teach you AT ALL, I spent a lot of hours over working myself, googling, and youtubing stuff that she could easily have taught us in a video. This course is entirely self-taught and she takes forever to grade.
rating_tags: EXTRA CREDIT--Gives good feedback--Lots of homework
